name: CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty.llp_isStableUnderRetracts
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
T : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
⊢ T.llp.IsStableUnderRetracts
decl:
lemma llp_isStableUnderRetracts : T.llp.IsStableUnderRetracts where
  of_retract h hg _ _ f hf :=
    letI := hg _ hf
    h.leftLiftingProperty f

name: CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty.rlp_isStableUnderRetracts
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
T : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
⊢ T.rlp.IsStableUnderRetracts
decl:
lemma rlp_isStableUnderRetracts : T.rlp.IsStableUnderRetracts where
  of_retract h hf _ _ g hg :=
    letI := hf _ hg
    h.rightLiftingProperty g

name: CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty.llp_isStableUnderCobaseChange
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
T : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
⊢ T.llp.IsStableUnderCobaseChange
decl:
instance llp_isStableUnderCobaseChange : T.llp.IsStableUnderCobaseChange where
  of_isPushout h hf _ _ g' hg' :=
    letI := hf _ hg'
    h.hasLiftingProperty g'

name: CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty.rlp_isStableUnderBaseChange
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
T : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
⊢ T.rlp.IsStableUnderBaseChange
decl:
open IsPullback in
instance rlp_isStableUnderBaseChange : T.rlp.IsStableUnderBaseChange where
  of_isPullback h hf _ _ f' hf' :=
    letI := hf _ hf'
    h.hasLiftingProperty f'

name: CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty.llp_isMultiplicative
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
T : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
⊢ T.llp.IsMultiplicative
decl:
instance llp_isMultiplicative : T.llp.IsMultiplicative where
  id_mem X _ _ p hp := by infer_instance
  comp_mem i j hi hj _ _ p hp := by
    have := hi _ hp
    have := hj _ hp
    infer_instance

name: CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty.rlp_isMultiplicative

C : Type u

T : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
⊢ T.rlp.IsMultiplicative
decl:
instance rlp_isMultiplicative : T.rlp.IsMultiplicative where
  id_mem X _ _ p hp := by infer_instance
  comp_mem i j hi hj _ _ p hp := by
    have := hi _ hp
    have := hj _ hp
    infer_instance

name: CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty.llp_IsStableUnderCoproductsOfShape
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
T : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
J : Type u_1
⊢ T.llp.IsStableUnderCoproductsOfShape J
decl:
lemma llp_IsStableUnderCoproductsOfShape (J : Type*) :
    T.llp.IsStableUnderCoproductsOfShape J := by
  apply IsStableUnderCoproductsOfShape.mk
  intro A B _ _ f hf X Y p hp
  have := fun j ↦ hf j _ hp
  infer_instance

name: CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty.rlp_IsStableUnderProductsOfShape
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
T : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
J : Type u_1
⊢ T.rlp.IsStableUnderProductsOfShape J
decl:
lemma rlp_IsStableUnderProductsOfShape (J : Type*) :
    T.rlp.IsStableUnderProductsOfShape J := by
  apply IsStableUnderProductsOfShape.mk
  intro A B _ _ f hf X Y p hp
  have := fun j ↦ hf j _ hp
  infer_instance
